item.title: Report X-2025041546
item.description:
Report X-2025041546

Identified by scraper @ 2025-05-23T00:57:51+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-04-16
  • City: WEST COLUMBIA
  • State: SC
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO OF DELAWARE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: RESPONDER CALLED TO PD3 HMI AT M6 BELT FOR A LEAKING PACKAGE ON AN IRREG TABLE. WENT TO AREA. RESPONDED TO PACKAGE USING THE DECISION TREE AND RESPONSE SHEETS. CONTAINERIZED PACKAGE AND CLEAN UP MATERIALS IN A SPILL TRAY AND RETURNED TO THE DMP CAGE FOR FURTHER PROCESSING.
